rev.diff:
Line 26: Line 26:
'''Upgrade Icon''' is a script written to make it easier to install many programs, including licensed programs such as Flash, Java, and Google Earth. It is accessible as an icon on the user's desktop. Future versions will not have the Upgrade Icon but will come with a new program called Ultamatix.
'''Upgrade Icon''' is a script written to make it easier to install many programs, including licensed programs such as Flash, Java, and Google Earth. It is accessible as an icon on the user's desktop. Future versions will not have the Upgrade Icon but will come with a new program called Ultamatix.
â
'''[http://ultamatix.com/ Ultamatix]''' is a program based off of Automatix that automates the install of harder to install software. It includes games, desktop environments, scripts, codecs, and much more. [[Automatix]] was discontinued, but taken over by the creator of Ultimate Edition. The code has been re-written so that it causes less problems with upgrades that the original Automatix was blamed for. It can also be downloaded for use on any Ubuntu 8.04 based distribution.
+
'''[[Ultamatix]]''' is a program based off of Automatix that automates the install of harder to install software. It includes games, desktop environments, scripts, codecs, and much more. [[Automatix]] was discontinued, but taken over by the creator of Ultimate Edition. The code has been re-written so that it causes less problems with upgrades that the original Automatix was blamed for. It can also be downloaded for use on any Ubuntu 8.04 based distribution.
== Specialized Editions ==
== Specialized Editions ==
